languages.text: {n}Ваш вокс тихонько шипит, привлекая ваше внимание. Кажется, вас настойчиво вызывают уже какое-то время.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, требуется ваше немедленное вмешательство. Баржи, которые вы направили на Даргонус, подверглись атаке вражеских кораблей, только что вышедших из варпа".

{n}Your vox-caster hisses softly, drawing your attention. It seems someone has been hailing you for some time now.{/n} "Lord Captain, your immediate intervention is required. The barges you sent to Dargonus have been attacked by enemy ships that just emerged from the warp."
languages.original_text: {n}Ваш вокс тихонько шипит, привлекая ваше внимание. Кажется, вас настойчиво вызывают уже какое-то время.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, требуется ваше немедленное вмешательство. Баржи, которые вы направили на Даргонус, подверглись атаке вражеских кораблей, только что вышедших из варпа".

traits.locale_text: {n}Your vox-caster hisses softly, drawing your attention. You seem to have been hailed for some time now.{/n} "Lord Captain, your immediate intervention is required. The barges you sent to Dargonus have been attacked by enemy ships that had just emerged from the warp."

{n}Your vox-caster hisses softly, drawing your attention. You seem to have been hailed for some time now.{/n} "Lord Captain, your immediate intervention is required. The barges you sent to Dargonus have been attacked by enemy ships that had just emerged from the warp."

{n}Your vox-caster hisses softly, drawing your attention. It seems someone has been hailing you for some time now.{/n} "Lord Captain, your immediate intervention is required. The barges you sent to Dargonus have been attacked by enemy ships that just emerged from the warp."

{n}Your vox-caster hisses softly, drawing your attention. It seems someone has been hailing you for some time now.{/n} "Lord Captain, your immediate intervention is required. The barges you sent to Dargonus have been attacked by enemy ships that just emerged from the warp."

{n}Your vox-caster hisses softly, drawing your attention. It seems someone has been hailing you for some time now.{/n} "Lord Captain, your immediate intervention is required. The barges you sent to Dargonus have been attacked by enemy ships that just emerged from the warp."

{n}Your vox-caster hisses softly, drawing your attention. It seems someone has been hailing you for some time now.{/n} "Lord Captain, your immediate intervention is required. The barges you sent to Dargonus have been attacked by enemy ships that just emerged from the warp."

languages.text: {n}Tu voco amplificador sisea con suavidad para llamar tu atención. Parece que alguien lleva un tiempo intentando contactar contigo.{/n} «Lord Capitán, necesitamos que intervenga de inmediato. Unas naves enemigas acaban de surgir de la disformidad para atacar a las que envió a Dargonus».
languages.original_text: {n}Your vox-caster hisses softly, drawing your attention. It seems someone has been hailing you for some time now.{/n} "Lord Captain, your immediate intervention is required. The barges you sent to Dargonus have been attacked by enemy ships that just emerged from the warp."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu voco amplificador sisea con suavidad para llamar tu atención. Parece que alguien lleva un tiempo intentando contactar contigo.{/n} «Lord Capitán, necesitamos que intervenga de inmediato. Unas naves enemigas acaban de surgir de la disformidad para atacar a las que envió a Dargonus».

languages.text: {n}你的音阵装置发出了轻柔的嘶嘶声，引起了你的注意。看起来，似乎什么人一直在呼叫你。{/n}“舰长大人，目前的情况需要您立刻指示。一支敌方舰队突然从亚空间中出现，袭击了您派往达戈努斯的驳船。”
languages.original_text: {n}Your vox-caster hisses softly, drawing your attention. It seems someone has been hailing you for some time now.{/n} "Lord Captain, your immediate intervention is required. The barges you sent to Dargonus have been attacked by enemy ships that just emerged from the warp."

traits.locale_text: {n}你的音阵装置发出了轻柔的嘶嘶声，引起了你的注意。看起来，似乎什么人一直在呼叫你。{/n}“舰长大人，目前的情况需要您立刻指示。一支敌方舰队突然从亚空间中出现，袭击了您派往达戈努斯的驳船。”

languages.text: {n}音声通信送受信装置がシューと柔らかく音を立て、注意を引く。誰かがこれまで挨拶しようとしているように思える。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、即時介入が必要です。ダルゴナスに送った船が<歪み>から現れた敵船に攻撃されています」
languages.original_text: {n}Your vox-caster hisses softly, drawing your attention. It seems someone has been hailing you for some time now.{/n} "Lord Captain, your immediate intervention is required. The barges you sent to Dargonus have been attacked by enemy ships that just emerged from the warp."

traits.locale_text: {n}音声通信送受信装置がシューと柔らかく音を立て、注意を引く。誰かがこれまで挨拶しようとしているように思える。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、即時介入が必要です。ダルゴナスに送った船が<歪み>から現れた敵船に攻撃されています」

languages.text: {n}De votre émetteur vox s'élève un léger sifflement, qui attire aussitôt votre attention. Apparemment, quelqu'un cherche à vous contacter depuis un bon moment.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, vous devez intervenir immédiatement. Les barges que vous avez envoyées vers Dargonus sont prises d'assaut par des vaisseaux ennemis fraîchement débarqués du Warp. »
languages.original_text: {n}Your vox-caster hisses softly, drawing your attention. It seems someone has been hailing you for some time now.{/n} "Lord Captain, your immediate intervention is required. The barges you sent to Dargonus have been attacked by enemy ships that just emerged from the warp."

traits.locale_text: {n}De votre émetteur vox s'élève un léger sifflement, qui attire aussitôt votre attention. Apparemment, quelqu'un cherche à vous contacter depuis un bon moment.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, vous devez intervenir immédiatement. Les barges que vous avez envoyées vers Dargonus sont prises d'assaut par des vaisseaux ennemis fraîchement débarqués du Warp. »

languages.text: {n}Voksyayarın hafifçe tıslayarak dikkatini çekiyor. Görünüşe göre birisi bir süredir sana ulaşmaya çalışıyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, acil müdahaleniz gerekiyor. Dargonus'a gönderdiğiniz mavnalar, öteboyuttan az önce çıkan düşman gemilerinin saldırısına uğradı."
languages.original_text: {n}Your vox-caster hisses softly, drawing your attention. It seems someone has been hailing you for some time now.{/n} "Lord Captain, your immediate intervention is required. The barges you sent to Dargonus have been attacked by enemy ships that just emerged from the warp."

traits.locale_text: {n}Voksyayarın hafifçe tıslayarak dikkatini çekiyor. Görünüşe göre birisi bir süredir sana ulaşmaya çalışıyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, acil müdahaleniz gerekiyor. Dargonus'a gönderdiğiniz mavnalar, öteboyuttan az önce çıkan düşman gemilerinin saldırısına uğradı."

languages.text: {n}Ein sanftes Zischen aus deinem Vox-Transmitter erregt deine Aufmerksamkeit. Offenbar versucht jemand seit geraumer Zeit, dich zu erreichen.{/n} "Lord Captain, Ihr müsst sofort etwas unternehmen. Die Lastschiffe, die Ihr nach Dargonus geschickt habt, wurden von feindlichen Schiffen attackiert, die plötzlich aus dem Warp kamen."
languages.original_text: {n}Your vox-caster hisses softly, drawing your attention. It seems someone has been hailing you for some time now.{/n} "Lord Captain, your immediate intervention is required. The barges you sent to Dargonus have been attacked by enemy ships that just emerged from the warp."

Offenbar versucht jemand seit geraumer Zeit, dich zu erreichen.{/n} "Lord Captain, Ihr müsst sofort etwas unternehmen. Die Lastschiffe, die Ihr nach Dargonus geschickt habt, wurden von feindlichen Schiffen attackiert, die plötzlich aus dem Warp kamen."
